title.bibl: Svornost, March 27th, 1880. A Promising Bohemian Youth.

div.bibl: Svornost, March 27th, 1880. A Promising Bohemian Youth.

body.p: The pupils of Prof. Prosinger recently gave a concert in the Natteson Bldg. which was very successful and for us Bohemians the more significant because of all the pupils the most outstanding performance was that of a young countryman of our Josef Vilim in his violin rendition of Ernests "Elegie."
His playing showed such fine harmony, such wonderful skill that the audience was enraptured.
Mr. Vilim is about 17 years old and a brother of the well-known Mrs. Bedlan.
